ComicInfo.Title: The Quark - Son of Quack; Into the Motherlode!; Duckaneer; The Fleet Foot Foogle!; Fear; A Christmas Carol
ComicInfo.Summary:
The classic humor anthology comic series concludes with early work from Frank Brunner, Steve Leialoha and Michael T. Gilbert.
Editorial: Friedrich (1 page text)
The Quark, Son Of Quack: Richards, Leonard, Gonick (10 pages)
Rick Rabbit: Into The Motherlode: Leialoha (10 pages)
You-All Gibbon: Friedrich, Shaw! (1 page text)
Duckaneer: Brunner, Leialoha (11 pages)*
The Fleet Foot Foogle!: Marrs (8 pages)
The Wraith: Fear: Gilbert (5 pages)
The Wraith: A Christmas Carol: Gilbert, Richards, Macklin, Shaw!, Brunner, Leialoha, Marrs, Gordon, McAllister (3 pages)
*The Duckaneer strip is a reprint of the first episode of the Duckaneer serial from Quack! #1.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-16 10:25:45. [CVDB18065]
ComicInfo.Writer: Ted Richards, Steve Leialoha, Frank Brunner, Lee Marrs, Michael T. Gilbert, Mike Friedrich, Scott Shaw
ComicInfo.Penciller: Ted Richards, Steve Leialoha, Frank Brunner, Lee Marrs, Michael T. Gilbert, Al Gordon, Frank Brunner, J. Michael Leonard, Ken Macklin, Larry Gonick, Lee Marrs, Michael T. Gilbert, Scott Shaw, Steve Leialoha, Ted Richards
ComicInfo.Inker: Ted Richards, Larry Gonick, J. Michael Leonard, Steve Leialoha, Lee Marrs, Michael T. Gilbert, Al Gordon, Al Gordon, Frank Brunner, J. Michael Leonard, Ken Macklin, Larry Gonick, Lee Marrs, Michael T. Gilbert, Scott Shaw, Steve Leialoha, Ted Richards
ComicInfo.Letterer: Ted Richards, Tom Orzechowski, Lee Marrs, Michael T. Gilbert, Mary McAllister
